title: Navigate forwards to a spin button
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Adults' spinbutton.
assertions: roleSpinbutton editable nameAdults value1 minimumValue1 maximumValue8 0:interactionModeEnabled

title: Navigate backwards to a spin button
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Adults' spinbutton.
assertions: roleSpinbutton editable nameAdults value1 minimumValue1 maximumValue8 0:interactionModeEnabled

title: Request information about a spin button
instructions: Starting at the 'Adults' spinbutton, read information about the spinbutton.
assertions: roleSpinbutton editable nameAdults value1 minimumValue1 maximumValue8

title: Request information about an invalid value in a spin button
instructions: Starting at the 'Adults' spinbutton, read information about the spinbutton.
assertions: roleSpinbutton editable nameAdults value9 isInvalid minimumValue1 maximumValue8 errorMessage

title: Increment a spin button by one step
instructions: Starting at the 'Adults' spin button, set its value to 2.

title: Decrement a spin button by one step
instructions: Starting at the 'Adults' spin button, set its value to 1.

title: Type an invalid value into a spin button
instructions: Starting at the 'Adults' spin button, set its value to 9
